description: Shared field mapping utility: mapTicketToTaskFields converts ticket data to task-compatible fields (title→task_name, description, assigned_to, due_date, estimated_hours hours→minutes)

Shared field mapping utility: mapTaskToTicketPrefill converts task data to ticket-compatible prefill (task_name→title, description, assigned_to, due_date, estimated_hours minutes→hours, project client_id)
Shared field mapping: priorities are explicitly excluded from mapping in both directions
PrefillFromTicketDialog: dialog component with searchable ticket list using TicketSelect
PrefillFromTicketDialog: auto-link checkbox (default: on) controls whether selected ticket is added to pending links
PrefillFromTicketDialog: on confirm, fetches full ticket data via getConsolidatedTicketData and returns mapped fields
TaskForm: add prefillData prop that initializes form state (task_name, description, assigned_to, due_date, estimated_hours, pendingTicketLink)
TaskForm: icon button (Ticket icon) visible only in create mode, near task name label, tooltip 'Create from ticket'
TaskForm: clicking prefill icon opens PrefillFromTicketDialog, on confirm populates all form fields and optionally adds ticket to pendingTicketLinks
QuickAddTicket: add prefilledTitle prop that initializes title state
QuickAddTicket: add prefilledAssignedTo prop that initializes assignedTo state
QuickAddTicket: add prefilledDueDate prop that initializes due date state
QuickAddTicket: add prefilledEstimatedHours prop that initializes estimated hours state and shows input field
QuickAddTicket: estimated_hours appended to FormData in handleSubmit
addTicket server action: parse estimated_hours from FormData and include in ticket creation
TaskTicketLinks: add taskData prop to receive current task field values from TaskForm
TaskTicketLinks: on 'Create Ticket' click, fetch project client via getProject(projectId)
TaskTicketLinks: pass all prefill props (title, description, client, assignedTo, dueDate, estimatedHours) to QuickAddTicket
TaskForm: pass current field values as taskData to TaskTicketLinks in edit mode
CreateTaskFromTicketDialog: dialog with project selector (CustomSelect + getProjects)
CreateTaskFromTicketDialog: on project select, fetches phases and statuses for that project
CreateTaskFromTicketDialog: phase selector populated from selected project's phases
CreateTaskFromTicketDialog: status selector populated from selected project's statuses
CreateTaskFromTicketDialog: auto-link checkbox (default: on)
CreateTaskFromTicketDialog: on confirm, opens TaskQuickAdd in drawer with prefillData mapped from ticket
TaskQuickAdd: add prefillData prop and pass through to TaskForm
TicketDetails: add renderCreateProjectTask render prop for cross-package button injection
TicketDetailsContainer: pass renderCreateProjectTask prop through to TicketDetails
MspTicketDetailsContainerClient: inject CreateTaskFromTicketDialog button via renderCreateProjectTask
Projects package exports CreateTaskFromTicketDialog for use by msp-composition
